name: Niza Global
description: Niza Coin (NIZA) a blockchain Ethereum (ERC20) token, is the native digital currency of our ecosystem. It facilitates transactions within the Niza Global platform and serves as a channel of exchange, unit of account, and store of value. With a total supply of 10 billion Niza Coins, we aim to create a dynamic and versatile digital asset that empowers users across various financial activities.
